original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND c.Score=2 AND p.ViewCount<=7710 AND p.CommentCount<=12 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount<=4 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-27 03:58:22' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.UpVotes>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 2

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.ViewCount <= 7710 AND posts.CommentCount <= 12 AND (CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) <= 4) AND posts.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 03:58:22'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.Id=E3.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.UpVotes >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2E3E4.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E4E6E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3E4E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E3E4E6.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4E6E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E4E6E5 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E3E4E6E5.Id)
